metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2680 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: This CVE exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2021-3750. Morespecifically, the qemu-kvm package as released for Red Hat Enterprise Linux9.1 via RHSA-2022:7967 included a version of qemu-kvm that was actuallymissing the fix for CVE-2021-3750.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
